data.actual_result: Sometimes the "You are being rate limited" toast pops up for no reason
data.expected_result: The screen does just rotate and nothing else happens
data.short_description: When you repeatedly rotate your screen while viewing pinned messages, you may see some "You are being rate limited" toasts appearing randomly
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any text channel - View pinned messages - rotate your screen several times in a row
